Items.Name: AB Elektriska Motorcentralen
Items.Description:
Välkommen till Elmotorcentralen, eller som vi kallar oss i vardagen – EMC!

Företaget Elmotorcentralen bildades som företag den 28 november 1948. 
Ombildningen till aktiebolag skedde på 50- talet och namnet blev då 
Aktiebolaget Elektriska Motorcentralen, registrerat år 1956.

 När spänningen i våra eluttag ändrade från 110 till 220 Volt växte företaget 
snabbt, då i princip all utrustning som innehöll en lindning måste åtgärdas. 
Affärsidén sedan starten har varit reparation och försäljning av all tänkbar 
elektromekanisk utrustning.

 Kunderna finns i norra och mellersta Sverige och företaget arbetar nästan 
uteslutande mot företag. EMC är bland annat partner tillsammans med ABB när det 
gäller motorer och har idag ett mycket stort lager av nya motorer i Skellefteå, 
från 0,12 till 90 kW. 

 Vidare säljer och reparerar företaget läns, slam och avloppspumpar, många 
olika typer av mekaniska växlar, samt skurmaskiner. Som nämnts i början av 
texten är EMC är ett gammalt anrikt Skellefteå- företag, som tillhandahållit 
tjänster inom vårt affärsområde sedan slutet av 1940-talet. 

 Våra huvudsakliga arbetsområden
 Vi säljer nya och reparerar:
- de marknadsledande varumärkena i Sverige av elmotorer
- avloppspumpar, länspumpar, dräneringspumpar, cirkulationspumpar 
- transmissioner som exempelvis tappväxlar, snäckväxlar och kuggväxlar
 - kraftelektronik som exempelvis frekvensomriktare och mjukstarters.

 Förutom detta är vi specialiserade på reparationer av professionella 
skurmaskiner av exempelvis märken som Taski, Hako med flera.

Items.Name: Ads Muhendislik Elektrik Elektronik Insaat San. ve Tic. Ltd. Sti.
Advanced Automation LLC
Items.Description:
Advanced Automation LLC is a team of engineers, craftsmen, and other hard working individuals who are dedicated to the development of robotic systems. Since 2012, we have implemented a variety of automated systems as well as integrating solutions into existing systems. We maintain experience solving a wide variety of automation manufacturing problems. Our team designs and implements systems employing advanced machine routing, machine vision, and personnel safety. These systems are in use across a number of industries, with applications ranging from adhering, marking, and routing, to welding and the actual assembly of your components.

Our team of engineers develop, document, and fabricate automation systems in the areas of automotive, electronics, and consumer products. Our automated manufacturing systems have been proven to satisfy our clients’ most exacting demands for performance, reliability and ease of use.

Advanced Automation LLC offers a solution for every stage of our client’s project.

Project consultation
Mechanical, electrical, and control system development
Development of system specifications
3D computer aided engineering designs and 2D wiring schematics
System commissioning and startup
Operator training
Detailed operating and maintenance documentation
On-site maintenance service and troubleshooting support

This allows us to meet the quality and production requirements our customers demand.

Items.Name: AF-Industry AB
Items.Description:
ÅF is an engineering and consulting company for the energy, industrial and infrastructure markets. 

Our pool of experience, with a unique range of technologies, creates solutions that are profitable, innovative and sustainable.

ÅF strives to be the best partner for the best clients.
Wherever and whenever ÅF is involved, we aim to help you to play a part in creating a more sustainable society by finding new solutions to old problems. Our sustainability policies and guidelines support this ambition, ensuring that we work in a fair and transparent way. We practice what we preach.

Items.Name: AF-Industry AB
Items.Description:
AFRY is an international engineering, design and advisory company. 
We are 17,000 devoted experts within the fields of infrastructure, industry and energy, operating across the world to create sustainable solutions for future generations.
AFRY’s five divisions, Infrastructure, Industrial & Digital Solutions, Process Industries, Energy, and Management Consulting, offer engineering, design and advisory services across three main sectors: infrastructure, industry and energy. 
We create sustainable engineering and design solutions
As an engineering and consulting company operating across the globe, we connect technologies to create progress for you, our clients. Choose your industry below to find out what services we can provide for you. 

-	Architecture & Design

Items.Name: Al Zubair General Trading LLC
Items.Description:
From a small beginning in 1968 the Zubair Electric Group has now grown into a multi-facet, multi-product and multi-location entity. The Group is today among
the leading players in the marketing of power generation, transmission,lighting products, lighting control system and services.The main activities of the Group are marketing of electrical and mechanical engineering oriented and bulk distributed products and undertaking lighting andlighting control projects on a turnkey basis. In this respect, Zubair Electric Group offers an unbeatable combination. It brings together dynamic, highly talented professionals and sophisticated
leading edge technology to deliver superior products and customized services. Committed to providing the highest level of products and services, Zubair
Electric Group carefully tracks the evolution of the technology and is continuously upgrading and expanding upon the extensive knowledge base of its
people. This allows customers to benefit from the convergence of technologies that enhance the overall efficiency and cost effectiveness of products and
services the Group offers. The Group represents over 60 principals on an exclusive / majority participation basis and together with its manufacturing unit, employs over 200 personnel. It has long established relationships with numerous consultants, contractors, dealers, wholesalers and institutional buyers in all areas of operations.

Items.Name: Alfanar Electrical Systems
Items.Description:
Alfanar industrial automation as an entity of Alfanar Group, is a leading industrial automation solution integrator in the region, providing high-end robotic and automation solutions that is customized to fulfill the customer requirements. 

 

Our scope expands to include the full value chain, from the initial customer request till the successful realization of the project and handover at the customer side. In addition of providing extraordinary high-quality aftersales services for all provided solutions throughout the project lifetime.

 

Our staff owns an experience of more than 15 years of hands-on execution for 60+ major automation projects which includes both robotic and non-robotic applications. We are specialized in welding, assembly technology, material handling, machine tending, packing and palletizing, testing, measurement, and inspection and we position ourselves as Industry 4.0 Enablers.

Alfanar industrial automation is committed to provide its customer with the most advanced, optimized, and yet cost-competitive solutions which would leverage the customer experience to a totally new level.

Items.Name: Algol Technics Oy

We are actively part of this change by offering our customers intralogistic solutions that encompass cranes, robotics, conveyors and automated warehouses, as well as a wide range of technical products. We also offer comprehensive maintenance and after-sales services for all our solutions.

Items.Name: Alsanbo Electricidad
Items.Description:
Grupo Alsanbo S.A. es una empresa con sede en Elche (Alicante). Con más de 30 años de existencia que ha servido para consolidar la empresa, creciendo, innovando y afrontando nuevos retos en el sector eléctrico, de automatización y telecomunicaciones.

 
La empresa nació con un enfoque claramente tecnológico y progresivamente surgieron nuevas líneas de negocio para satisfacer las necesidades de varios clientes, acompañándolos en todo el proceso de desarrollo de sus instalaciones o productos, desde el diseño y concepción hasta la puesta en marcha.

 
A lo largo de estos años, Grupo Alsanbo ha proporcionado productos y servicios profesionales a grandes compañias, universidades y una variedad de referentes en el mercado. Varias empresas internacionales han confiado en nosotros en los últimos años, quedando patente con el nombramiento de Grupo Alsanbo como Distribuidor Oficial de sus productos o Partners.

 
Todo nuestro personal ha trabajado activamente en los sectores de la electricidad, la automatización y las telecomunicaciones en algún momento durante los últimos 15 años, lo que garantiza la preparación de la empresa para cubrir cualquier demanda.

Items.Name: ALSITER S.r.l.
Items.Description:
SADAS è una combinazione unica di volontà di successo e di energie fresche, 
unite ad una ampia e profonda esperienza e conoscenza nel settore della 
progettazione elettrica e software, della automazione ed avviamento di impianti 
per la carta, sul mercato internazionale.
Oggi questo ha portato le persone di SADAS a lavorare con successo a fianco dei 
più importanti produttori di macchine da carta e fornitori di prodotti e 
componenti a livello internazionale.
Per l’industria della carta, nell’ambito della Elettrificazione ed Automazione, 
SADAS offre servizi di progettazione, consulenza e commissioning,  prodotti e 
forniture di impianti chiavi in mano.
Oltre a progetti Green Field, SADAS supporta Revamping anche molto complessi, 
garantendo tempi minimi di fermata dell’impianto.
Le numerosissime e prestigiose installazioni effettuate nelle varie cartiere 
del mondo, fanno di SADAS   un protagonista di primo piano nel settore del Pulp 
& Paper, che vede SADAS condividere una scena importante assieme ai principali 
operatori del settore.
Sadas, grazie ad una profonda conoscenza tecnica dei drive e PLC ABB, è 
riconosciuta come ABB Authorized Value Provider per le attività di service.

Items.Name: AMServ Mitte GmbH & Co. KG
Items.Description:
Willkommen bei AMServ 
AMServ ist eine deutschlandweit tätige Gruppe von Dienstleistungszentren für 
elektrische rotierende Maschinen. 

Was bedeutet dies für Sie? 
Ihnen stehen hochqualifizierte Ansprechpartner, Monteure und 
Service-Mitarbeiter an den gut ausgestatteten Standorten in Halle, Hamburg, 
Neusäß und Schiffweiler zur Verfügung. Als ABB-Vertriebs- und Servicepartner 
liefern wir Ihnen auch Originalersatzteile, Neumotoren und Komponenten von ABB. 
Ferner haben wir unser Lieferspektrum um den Verkauf von Frequenzumrichtern, 
Stromrichtern und weiterem Antriebszubehör erweitert. Auf eine gute 
Zusammenarbeit freut sich Ihr Team von AMServ.

Level of Ex Service Partner authorization: PREMIUM max. IEC 450 frame size.

Items.Name: Analytical Solutions And Products B.V.
Items.Description: Analytical Solutions and Products (ASaP) is a company with a flexible, dedicated, and growing team, in support of a clear goal: To supply practical solutions for your analytical needs. This applies to online process analysis as well as laboratory and experimental analysis. The analyzer products, sample conditioning components, and integrated systems are particularly suitable for gas and liquefied samples. ASaP’s worldwide customer circle use the supplied products and solutions for process control, product quality control, energy savings, and the control of (environmental) emission standards and licenses.

Items.Name: Andersson & Hansson Automation AB
Items.Description:
AH Automation is a technology company that delivers solutions in industrial 
automation, Marinel and infrastructure. These three business areas means we are 
standing firmly and is a safe and long-term partner for customers and clients. 
In AH Automation combines experience and traditions from over 60 years in the 
industry with new technology and new knowledge in an inspiring environment in 
the outer coast.

Items.Name: Andon Robotics AB
Items.Description:
Andon Robotics is an application company with focus on solutions for robotized low batch production.

We are the complete partner for integrating of robots into your production. The accumulated experience has been gained from a vast number of successful installations around the world and ensures that we together can create a profitable production system.

We have deep competence in material handling, robots and external axis, software and welding processes as well as extensive production knowledge. Robot carriers and workpiece positioner, as well as graphical user interfaces and production supervision are all standard Andon Robotics building blocks, which enable systems to be supplied for most requirements.

Andon Robotics is Your partner irrespective of level automation or complexity.

Items.Name: Andrew Donald Design Engineers
Items.Description:
Andrew Donald Design Engineering Pty Ltd is a specialist in the design of 
industrial automation solutions. With extensive experience across a range of 
industries including pharmaceuticals, automotive, general manufacturing and 
material handling, we integrate the right combinations of robotics, custom 
machinery, tooling, sensors and control systems to deliver manufacturing 
solutions to your unique requirements.
Andrew Donald Design Engineering is a ‘full service’ solution provider, with 
in-house mechanical, electrical and control system design, procurement, 
manufacture, installation and support. We always work closely with our 
customers from the initial requirements development, concept development and 
systems design through to integration into production to ensure our solutions 
fully deliver to customer expectations.
If you have a manufacturing bottleneck, quality control issue, labour cost 
issue or new manufacturing system Andrew Donald Design Engineering can solve 
your problems with a customised industrial automation solution.
